    • setPayloadLength

      public void setPayloadLength(byte[] payloadLength) throws Exception
      Payload length must be 2 bytes long and has an offset in the cell of 5 (position = 5)
      Overrides:
      setPayloadLength in class Cell
      Parameters:
      payloadLength - is how many bytes long the payload is
      Throws:
      Exception - is the payloadLength's length is more than 2 bytes long

    • setPayload

      public void setPayload(byte[] payload)
      Writes the payload to the totalMessage The payload offset is 8 (position = 8)
      Overrides:
      setPayload in class Cell
      Parameters:
      payload - is the body of the cell (data). Ex: GET request

    • setStreamId

      public void setStreamId(byte[] streamID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      The stream ID must be generated when the first cell of the stream is created
      Overrides:

    • setCommand

      public void setCommand(byte command)
      Puts the command (0) into the byte buffer that is the Cell
      Overrides:
      setCommand in class Cell
      Parameters:
      command - is a byte where only 0 is acceptable for this type of cell

    • setRelayCommand

      public void setRelayCommand(byte relayCommand)
      Overrides:
      setRelayCommand in class Cell
      Parameters:
      relayCommand - is the final header-element in front of the payload and can contain values 1-5, where: 0x1 = relayBegin 0x2 = relayExtend 0x3 = relayExtended 0x4 = relayData 0x5 = relayConnected 0x6 = streamClosing

    • getStreamID

      public byte[] getStreamID()
